titles.title: Housing for Homeless Students Act of 2024
Housing for Homeless Students Act of 2024
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to qualify homeless youth and veterans who are full-time students for purposes of the low-income housing tax credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Housing for Homeless Students Act of 2024
This bill extends eligibility for the low-income housing tax credit to homeless youth and veterans who are full-time students during a specified time period.
